EmailTemplate.subject: Carolina VMware Users Summit Follow up
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
It was great to meet and spend some time with you at VMware Forum on 2nd May – thanks for taking the time to come by and see us. As a follow-up to the event, I've linked below a few of the many resources designed to dive deeper into the ways VMTurbo will dramatically improve how you control and automate your virtual data center.
- Trial Download <http://bit.ly/QzvQgM> - check out VMTurbo in your environment, absolutely free - Online Evaluation Resource Center <http://bit.ly/Yz66Yv> for product and support info
And if you missed my breakout session, How to Guarantee VM Performance and Maximize Utilization, feel free to take a look at this whitepaper <http://bit.ly/11v0WKW>.
My team will be following up with you shortly to understand your priorities and interest in learning more about VMTurbo.If you would like to set up some time to get a more in-depth, tailored demonstration of our solution, please let us know here <http://bit.ly/145VraT>.
Kind regards Steve Corndell
